sentences.english: Swan Lake might be a good choice.
sentences.chinese: 天鵝湖是個不錯的選擇。

sentences.english: Who wrote the ballet Swan Lake?
sentences.chinese: 芭蕾舞劇《天鵝湖》是誰寫的？

sentences.english: The swan soon alighted upon a lake, where he swam and dove.
sentences.chinese: 下車後不久的天鵝湖，他在那裏游泳和鴿子。

sentences.english: One of the most beloved ballets is “Swan Lake.”
sentences.chinese: 最爲人們喜愛的芭蕾舞劇是“天鵝湖”。

sentences.english: The Sword-Shaped Rock Scenic Area consists of Goose Lake, Suspended Springs, Sword Rock, snow-covered Mountains and primeval forests.
sentences.chinese: 劍巖景區包括天鵝湖，懸瀑，劍巖，雪峯和原始森林。

sentences.english: "Swan Lake" is honored as one of the classic ballets.
sentences.chinese: 《天鵝湖》被奉爲芭蕾舞劇的經典。

sentences.english: Kitty and Peter have decided to see Swan Lake'this saturday.
sentences.chinese: 這個星期六基蒂和彼得決定去看“天鵝湖”。

sentences.english: Swan Lake is her most frequently performed ballet.
sentences.chinese: 《天鵝湖》是她最常演的芭蕾舞劇目。

sentences.english: Swan Lake' is one of Tchaikovsky's best-known compositions.
sentences.chinese: 《天鵝湖》是柴可夫斯基最著名的作品之一。

sentences.english: It is also home to the famous Swan Lake.
sentences.chinese: 它更是著名的天鵝湖的故鄉。

definition: Romeo and Juliet, 1594 tragedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚
pinyin: Luo2 mi4 ou1 yu3 Zhu1 li4 ye4

definition: Tale of the White Snake/Madame White Snake
Haydn (name)/Franz Joseph Haydn (1732-1809), Austrian classical composer
Anton Pavlovich Chekhov (1860-1904), Russian writer famous for his short stories and plays
The Sound of Music, Broadway musical (1959) and Academy Award-winning movie (1965)
